programme.title: Istanbul Aku Datang
programme.desc: Seorang gadis muda dari Malaysia pergi ke Istanbul untuk bertemu dengan teman lelaki kesayangannya, namun gadis yang naif itu tidak tahu apa yang akan berlaku kepada kehidupannya di sana.

programme.title: 1 Lawan Satu
programme.desc: Saleh dan Radhi, dua 'pejuang' yang datang dari latar belakang berbeza, namun bertemu di gelanggang pertarungan. Saleh dibesarkan dengan kemahiran seni mempertahankan diri dan kini sedang mencari adiknya yang telah hilang. Radhi pula bertarung demi menyelamatkan adik perempuannya, Sara, yang sedang sakit tenat dan memerlukan RM50,000 untuk rawatan.

programme.title: Dunia Baru The Movie
programme.desc: Filem ini bermula apabila Opie menemui sepucuk surat daripada Anizah yang menyatakan bahawa dia ingin berkahwin dengan teman lelakinya, Fazley, dan telah menguburkan impiannya untuk menyambung pelajaran ke UK.

programme.title: Abang Lejen
programme.desc: Dua beradik yang kehilangan ibu bapa mereka sejak kecil. Si abang sanggup mempertaruhkan nyawanya demi melindungi adiknya walau apa pun yang terjadi.

programme.title: Sejoli
programme.desc: Jo (Bront Palarae) dan Gina (Maya Karin) sedang menyembuhkan hati yang terluka di Phuket apabila takdir mempertemukan mereka. Pada mulanya mereka saling membenci, tetapi apabila mereka mendapat tahu bahawa bekas kekasih masing-masing, Hardy (Remy Ishak) dan Nita (Izara Aishah), akan berkahwin, mereka merancang untuk menggagalkan majlis perkahwinan tersebut.

programme.title: Hayya 1: The Power Of Love
programme.desc: Rahmat, wartawan yang dihantui dosa silam, berhijrah jadi relawan di kem pelarian Palestin dan bertemu Hayya, anak yatim piatu. Pertemuan itu mengubah hidupnya, namun bila dia pulang ke Indonesia untuk berkahwin dengan Yasna, tercetus konflik emosi yang rumit, lucu dan tegang antara mereka.

programme.title: Tukul Arwana One Man Show Ep34
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara yang dihoskan Tukul Arwana di Indosiar menyajikan hiburan terbaru yang akan menemani penonton semasa pandemik COVID-19 bersama bintang jemputan, tokoh masyarakat dan mereka yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: Bumiku Lampung S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sebuah program dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan dan kekayaan Lampung dengan sejuta kisah dalam alam semula jadi, budaya, kulinari dan kreativiti.

programme.title: Sepupu Metal Bikin Cinta Brutal
programme.desc: Farel, seorang lelaki yang lembut, diminta oleh neneknya untuk mencari sepupunya yang telah lama terpisah. Oleh kerana tidak mahu susah, Farel mengubah penampilan Dini, gadis berjiwa metal yang mempunyai ciri-ciri mirip sepupunya. Namun, dalam proses menjadikan Dini sebagai "Dinda", Farel akhirnya jatuh cinta padanya.

programme.title: Superstar Junior S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Superstar Junior S2 kembali mengetengahkan bakat asli kanak-kanak tempatan yang luar biasa dan menghiburkan, sesuai untuk tontonan seisi keluarga. Dengan persembahan yang comel, penuh tenaga dan menyentuh hati, rancangan ini bukan sahaja mempamerkan kehebatan generasi muda, malah turut diserikan dengan penglibatan juri dan mentor popular.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep16
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: My Heart Ep52
programme.desc: Raisa yang patah hati selepas tunangnya, Rio, hilang tiba-tiba, pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari jawapan. Di sana, dia bertemu Mike, seorang pelakon drama popular yang sebenarnya berperwatakan sensitif dan bermasalah, berbeza dengan wataknya di kaca TV. Perkenalan mereka secara kebetulan menjadi semakin rapat apabila mereka mula mengenali diri sebenar masing-masing. Namun, cinta mereka diuji apabila terbongkar bahawa ibu Mike, Rika, adalah isteri kedua kepada ayah Raisa, menyebabkan perebutan harta antara keluarga mereka.

programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep41
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep413
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Abang Cabe Pilar Kehidupan Wanita
programme.desc: Calista selalu meremehkan nilai wang kerana orang tuanya sangat kaya. Ibunya menghantar Calista ke Ciasem untuk menguruskan perniagaan ibunya selama sebulan sehingga berjaya, dan semua kemudahan yang dimilikinya disita. Calista meminta Kevin dan ibunya untuk menjadi pembekal cili untuk restorannya.

programme.title: Water Games Ep6
programme.desc: Sekumpulan peserta bertanding dalam pelbagai cabaran dalam satu permainan air, dengan impian memenangi hadiah utama.

programme.title: Awas Tercyduk Ep6
programme.desc: Awas Tercyduk, sebuah program realiti televisyen, mendedahkan kejadian yang tidak dijangka dalam kehidupan seharian kita.

programme.title: My Heart Ep52
programme.desc: Raisa yang patah hati selepas tunangnya, Rio, hilang tiba-tiba, pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari jawapan. programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep71
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Lampung Geh Ep28
programme.desc: Dokumentari perjalanan yang merakam keunikan Lampung, daripada keindahan alam semula jadi hingga pelbagai aktiviti menarik.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep415
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Pedagang Sate Klathak Yang Sukses Setelah Melewati Badai Ujian Yang Menimpanya
programme.desc: Sejak gerobaknya rosak, dia tidak lagi dapat berniaga sate klatak (kambing). Keadaan menjadi lebih rumit apabila Sarah tidak setuju suaminya bekerja di tempat Santi. Sarah tahu bahawa Santi ingin merampas suaminya. Bagaimanakah dia akan melalui ujian dalam hidupnya?

programme.title: D'Academy 7 Ep37
programme.desc: D Academy 7 ialah musim ketujuh rancangan nyanyian popular Indonesia yang fokus pada muzik dangdut. Peserta dari seluruh negara bertanding dengan menyanyikan lagu dangdut, menunjukkan bakat vokal dan persembahan mereka. Sepanjang musim, mereka dinilai oleh juri profesional dan undian penonton. Siapakah yang akan menjuarai D'Academy musim ketujuh?

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely can see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: Gyeong-Ah'S Daughter
programme.desc: After her husband passed away, Gyeong-ah relies on her daughter Yeon-su. But they barely meet each other. One day, Gyeong-ah gets an anonymous message about Yeon-su and goes into trauma...

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam exploits Sung-jin's weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble collecting seafood underwater because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they began engaging in the smuggling business.

programme.title: For The Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and the friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A protest against urban renewal leads to death of a cop and a teen. The boy's father was arrested for the cop's death. A young attorney is assigned to defend the father.

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the world's most legendary con man.

programme.title: Exhuma

programme.title: Way Back Into Love Ep18
programme.desc: Way Back into Love follows Xiao-qing Yang, who returns to her hometown Hualien with her daughter to help run her familys guesthouse. Caught between two men with contrasting values, Xiao-qing must navigate love, identity, and homecoming amid emotional twists and lifes rediscoveries.

programme.title: Way Back Into Love Ep19
programme.desc: Way Back into Love follows Xiao-qing Yang, who returns to her hometown Hualien with her daughter to help run her familys guesthouse. Reuniting with her childhood friend Bi-zhong, a quiet romance rekindles. Meanwhile, a fiery connection sparks with architect Zhi-bin during a renovation project. Caught between two men with contrasting values, Xiao-qing must navigate love, identity, and homecoming amid emotional twists and lifes rediscoveries.

programme.title: Battle Tour Ep123
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1080
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1081
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World Ep792
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom. <>

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef Ep3528
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: iWalker Ep10
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2059
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep154
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Taste of Life Ep151
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2405
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep156
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5194
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Beyond The Sin
programme.desc: The only daughter of Inspector Yan is brutally murdered, and her classmate Wen is arrested. Believing the case closed, Yan leaves the police force. However, when more girls are killed after Wens imprisonment, Yan begins to suspect the real killer is still at large and vows to find the truth.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighbouring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: The Wig
programme.desc: Meng Zhong is a law graduate overwhelmed by despair after failing the bar exam three times and vents his frustration on a drunken passenger one stormy night. Twenty years later, Meng is a successful lawyer, but his investigation into a sexual assault case involving a young girl rekindles haunting memories he cannot escape.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Amid the recession caused by the pandemic, debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. His unconventional approach leads to unexpected success, and his attitude toward his career and life is transformed after being inspired by the respected Master Wen.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Beyond The Sin
programme.desc: The only daughter of Inspector Yan is brutally murdered, and her classmate Wen is arrested. Believing the case closed, Yan leaves the police force. However, when more girls are killed after Wens imprisonment, Yan begins to suspect the real killer is still at large and vows to find the truth.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Cat Vs Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts world

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu's disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Devil's Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies' youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke's daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers' claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung's brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Gettimelam S1 Ep1

programme.title: Getting Even With Dad
programme.desc: When he is dropped off at the home of Ray Gleeson (Ted Danson), the father he hasn't seen in years, Timmy (Macaulay Culkin) hopes that they'll be able to spend some time together. Recognizing that only he can set his father straight, this inventive kid puts an end to their plans and makes Ray do time...as a dad!

programme.desc: Redemption Again - Everyone deserves a second chance! And this week on Wipeout, John and Nicole have each handpicked four teams to return to take on the Wipeout courseagain! Will it be team John or Team Nicole who will be taking home that $25,000 prize?

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S15 Ep17
programme.desc: NATIONAL FINALS 3 (PART 1) - The National Finals continue in Las Vegas as the remaining competitors move on to Stages 2 and 3 for their chance to win $1 million and become the next American Ninja Warrior.

programme.title: Elsbeth S1 Ep10
programme.desc: A Fitting Finale - An unlikable fashion photographer is murdered in the middle of a fashion show, Elsbeth and the team investigate.

programme.title: Coroner S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Fire - As Jenny investigates a devastating fire in a low-income apartment building, she connects with a woman who has lost everything.

programme.title: Blue Bloods S14 Ep3
programme.desc: Fear No Evil - Frank grapples with the personal loss of his best friend and how best to help Tess Ross (Simone Policano), the daughter of his best friend, when she lands in jail. Also, Jaime and his nephew, Joe Hill (Will Hochman), race against the clock to reunite a trafficking victim with her sister; and Danny and Erin clash when she goes behind Danny's back to use his criminal informant in an investigation.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex S7 Ep7
programme.desc: Kiss the Cod and Make them Die - Jesse and Stellas band gig goes sour when they become the victims of a mass poisoning, becoming key witnesses in piecing together a deadly night at the pub.

programme.title: Rookie Blue S5 Ep20
programme.desc: Ninety Degrees - As the officers of 15 Division try to move on from the corruption scandal, a heat wave hits and Jarvis opens the division to the public as a cooling station. programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S15 Ep18
programme.desc: NATIONAL FINALS 3 (PART 2) - The National Finals continue in Las Vegas as the remaining competitors move on to Stages 2 and 3 for their chance to win $1 million and become the next American Ninja Warrior.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Hot Prowl in the City - After a man is stabbed by an intruder who left no trace of a break-in, Rexs senses reveal it was only a practice run for a scheme that goes much deeper.

programme.title: Wipeout S9 Ep6
programme.desc: Big Ball Bromance - Wipeout is back, and we're turning the heat up a notch this season with newly single ladies spending their "Hot Girl Summer" on our craziest course ever. programme.title: Blacklist, The S10 Ep1
programme.desc: The Night Owl - Six months after Wujing's escape from custody, Reddington mysteriously resurfaces in Manhattan amidst an explosion. When a former Blacklister is found at the scene, the Task Force begins to investigate a larger conspiracy at play.

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Conservative businessman Dave Buznik (Adam Sandler) is usually a mild-mannered, non-confrontational guy. But after an altercation aboard an airplane, he is sentenced to an anger management program, only to discover that his instructor, Dr. Buddy Rydell (Jack Nicholson), has a serious anger problem of his own, one that will only fully reveal itself once Dr. Rydell moves into Dave's home to instruct him, hands-on, in the ways of calm behavior.

Meanwhile, Jarvis reveals the shocking news that 15 Division will be restructured following the corruption scandal.

programme.desc: The Reaper - With their respected colleague Josh Folsom under arrest for the death of Kahn Schefter - the man responsible for killing Folsom's mother - the CSI team combs through every crumb of forensic evidence to determine his innocence or guilt.

programme.title: Rainmaker, The S1 Ep2
programme.desc: EPISODE 2 - Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

Also, Jamie investigates a drug trafficking operation involving rival gangs; Danny and Baez look into a series of assaults in Little Vietnam with the help of a familiar face; and Frank is torn when he learns the Brotherhood of Teamsters are lobbying for NYPD officers to join their union.

programme.title: Rainmaker, The S1 Ep2
programme.desc: EPISODE 2 - Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: Rookie Blue S5 Ep22
programme.desc: 74 Epiphanies - With the 15 Division restructuring looming, Andy and Sam's wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help -or let Sam know she hasn't bailed. Will she save the man's life? Will she make it to her wedding?

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S15 Ep20
programme.desc: NATIONAL FINALS 4 (PART 2) - The National Finals conclude in Las Vegas as the remaining ninjas compete in Stage 3 and 4 and a $1 million winner is crowned as the next American Ninja Warrior.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Scar Tissue - With a new piece of evidence at play, Catherine Willows reopens an investigation from her past that never got solved after a violent attack left her hospitalized. Internal affairs begins questioning Folsom.

programme.title: FBI: International S4 Ep22
programme.desc: Gaijin - The Fly Team discovers theyre on the trail of a serial killer, taking the investigation, and Mitchell, to Japan to put an end to the international killing spree.

programme.title: NCIS: Origins S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Funky Bunch - NCIS: Origins follows a young Leroy Jethro Gibbs in 1991, years prior to the events of NCIS, and is narrated by Mark Harmon. In the series, Gibbs starts his career as a newly minted special agent at the fledgling NCIS Camp Pendleton office where he forges his place on a gritty, ragtag team led by NCIS legend Mike Franks.

programme.title: Frasier S6 Ep16
programme.desc: Decoys - Niles secretly schemes to break up Daphnes new romance with his divorce lawyer.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S6 Ep15
programme.desc: The Arrival: Part 1 - George reluctantly substitutes for Lionel in Jenny's childbirth classes.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Dreamworker - Gabrielle is kidnapped to become the bride of Morpheus, the god of dream, so Xena has to go through her Dreamscape Passage to save her friend.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Selfish - When it is reported a two year-old granddaughter is missing, the detectives investigate. After rounds of interrogation and a failed Amber Alert, the SVU believe that the prime suspect is none other than her irresponsible mother.

programme.title: Married... With Children S3 Ep01
programme.desc: The Camping Show - Al and Steve's much-anticipated vacation in the great outdoors is ruined by female hormones and man-eating animals.

programme.title: Quantum Leap S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Double Identity - Sam becomes a hit man in 1965 whose romance with the godfather's girlfriend places him in danger.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Samantha's Thanksgiving To Remember - Clara longs to see her Pilgrim friends on Thanksgiving Day. She casts a spell and zips everyone back to 1600's Plymouth. Worried about what might happen to witches, Darrin begs Samantha to get them back home.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 Ep13
programme.desc: Solid Gold Mother in-law - After she briefly turns him into a pony for Tabitha, Darren threatens to leave if Endora doesn't go first. Though Samantha convinces her mother to make amends, Endora sets out to endear herself to Darren.

programme.title: T. J. Hooker S2 Ep07
programme.desc: The Survival Syndrome - Scanty evidence puts Hooker in the spotlight again after an unarmed car theft suspect is shot and killed; Romano questions his future on the force after taking a bullet himself.

programme.desc: Decoys - Niles secretly schemes to break up Daphnes new romance with his divorce lawyer.

programme.desc: The Dinner Party - Frasiers plans for an elegant dinner party are thwarted at every turn.

programme.desc: Deadly Ambition - Hooker doesn't believe an over-zealous detective's claim that an old friend was the inside man in a jewelry heist. Jerry Lee Lewis guest stars.

programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her familys estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: Extreme sports athlete Xander Cage (Triple X) is recruited by the government to infiltrate a Russian crime ring led by Yorgi, sparking a high-stakes adventure across Europe.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: Smurfette and her friends go to the Forbidden Forest to find a lost village. When the evil wizard Gargamel gets to know of this, he devises a plan to stop the smurfs from discovering the town.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: A hopeful actress in Los Angeles befriends an amnesiac woman, and as they search for her identity, reality and illusion blur in a dreamlike thriller about ambition, identity, and Hollywood's dark side.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rovers number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme battles terrorists at a hockey game to save the Vice President and stop a stadium bombing in this explosive thriller. Can he stall the game long enough? Its Sudden Death!

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 4 - Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.title: Planet Earth S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Great Plains - The Tibetan fox and Mongolian gazelle are captured on film for the first time, while a 30-strong pride of lions hunt for elephants.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ice and Fire - Scandinavia's extremes have been shaped by ice and fire, but it's the sun that reigns here. Polar bears, musk oxen and arctic foxes must survive from the polar night to the midnight sun.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Simon travels through Brazil, from the heart of the Amazon rainforest to the coast and the glamorous-but-troubled city of Rio de Janeiro.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 4 - Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep7
programme.desc: In this episode, tortilla chips are produced by the thousand, bite-size coffee cakes are created, and vegan mint double chocolate cookies are made. Plus, a look at microwaveable popcorn.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep8
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of Triple "C" cheesecake, animal crackers, crispy sweet potato fries, and the tofu that gets a gourmet overhaul.

programme.title: Race Across the World S5 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 5 - The teams race to reach Sanya, one of China's most southerly cities.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep9
programme.desc: In this episode we get to peek at the production of Hershey's Kisses, a fusion of the French crepe and the Russian blini, the gummy candies that look just like rainforest frogs, and the extraction of Madagascan vanilla extract.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep10
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of tutti-frutti candies, spinach potato latkes, gluten-free shirataki noodles, and how to make guilt-free crisps with pinto beans and vegetables.

programme.desc: The New Wild - As the world changes, mammals must change with it in order to survive the new wild.

programme.desc: Griff Rhys Jones' North to South journey of New Zealand's back roads sees him arrive at the South Island and head deep into the interior to discover the stunning landscapes of the south.

programme.desc: Snowball - Life's existence hangs in the balance when ancient Earth almost entirely freezes over.

programme.desc: Destroyer of Worlds - When spring finally arrives in Alaska, the landscape and waterways come back to life with a vengeance as the snow and ice melt.

programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mist swirls around the base of Shanghai's skyline. From the city, tigers and monkeys seem as unreal and distant as dragons and mermaids emerging through the mist. Yet they exist as rare survivors in an extraordinary and diverse landscape. From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Haiti - Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Enjoy the view from a century-old water tower as it is transformed into a unique home, then take flight on a repurposing journey that will rocket the UK space programme to prominence.

programme.desc: Bulletproof - Alaskans contend with the throes of the warm season.

programme.title: Planet Earth S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Shallow Seas - The epic journey of a mother humpback whale and her calf is tracked in this episode, from tropical paradise to polar seas.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep13
programme.desc: See how the decadent flavour of ice cream is made with chocolate pudding and cookies. Plus, how champagne and strawberry lollipops are made, and how truffle pigs are filled with peanut butter.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Revealing the mouthwatering secrets behind tasty treats. This episode looks at how healthy muffins and red-hot candies are made.

programme.title: Croc Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Steve takes us into the dangerous world of crocodiles - one of nature's most fearsome predators - entering croc-infested territory escorted by an armed safari guide.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Danube: Europe's Mightiest River S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Romania - Joanna heads towards the Danube Delta, one of the last great wilderness areas remaining in Europe, full of birdlife including the majestic Pelican. At the mouth of the river, on Romania's Black Sea coast, Joanna bids farewell to the Danube and reflects on her amazing journey.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S11 Ep12
programme.desc: Andaluca - Ben Fogle travels to Spain's remote Andaluca Mountains to meet a British couple, Alan Parks and Lorna Penfold, who left their careers to become alpaca farmers.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep14
programme.desc: Transitions - Alaskans harness the power of the sun as they toil through summer.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Untamed West - New Zealand's West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Crowded Seas - Dip into North America's southern coastal waters, where opalescent squid mate, sea turtles nest, and mobula rays take flight for the sake of romance. Fly a specialized drone with Lizzie as she swoops in for a breath sample from a blue whale.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Coral Seas - Marvel at North America's natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, digs for ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Prowl with jaguars that stalk a Costa Rican beach and meet the planet's biggest sharks.

programme.title: 13 Hours To Survive S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Escape to the Deep - Count down the seconds as the sun sets and predators prowl around the pool before the tide finally rolls in. Persevere as night falls with a kleptomaniacal slug and an acrobatic scallop, while a pair of sneaky crabs take a dangerous shot at romance.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Life on the Wing - Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Weatherproof - Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchins Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Hummingbirds Quest - From Colombia's high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Fortresses - In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchins Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Hummingbirds Quest - From Colombia's high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Fortresses - In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Bears Thanksgiving - Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual pre-hibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bear-friendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Agile - Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Into The Wild Colombia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchins Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Love - It's not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider who'll risk his life for love.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ocean Legacy - Spring on New Zealand's east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. They've returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo - but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo - but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade's life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini's hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she's been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep11
programme.desc: My Fair Foosa - To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien civilizes a Foosa.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Itty Bitty Blossom - The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Dollhouse Store Day - When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip's Music Store!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep16
programme.desc: P.u. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn't be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep's traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn't until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it's time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces it's time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she's got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D'Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D'Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn't be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep's traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn't until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it's time to start a new tradition.
